duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the maintenance and reliability engineering activities for utilities systems, buildings, and production/non-production equipment.
Track repair history of process support systems and equipment, and lead continuous improvement activities.
Conduct safety inspections, plant audits, and troubleshoot equipment and systems.
Read and interpret detailed blueprints and schematics, and ensure maintenance activity is completed within designated timeframe.
Train peers and mechanics on equipment supported by the Instrument Shop, and make recommendations regarding improved machine performance.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED, with 2+ years of experience (Bachelor's Degree preferred)
